page.title: Divisions
page.subtitle: Explore our specialized divisions that work together to deliver comprehensive youth services and ensure organizational excellence.

overview.title: Organizational Divisions
overview.description: Our specialized divisions ensure efficient operations, quality service delivery, and comprehensive support for all NYSC programs and initiatives.

finance.title: Finance Division
finance.description: Managing financial operations, budget planning, and ensuring fiscal responsibility across all NYSC programs and initiatives.

legalInvestigation.title: Legal & Investigation Division
legalInvestigation.description: Providing legal counsel, ensuring compliance, and conducting investigations to maintain organizational integrity.

youthAwards.title: Youth Awards Division
youthAwards.description: Recognizing outstanding youth achievements and managing award programs that celebrate excellence and innovation.

internalAudit.title: Internal Audit Division
internalAudit.description: Ensuring internal controls, risk management, and compliance with policies and procedures across all operations.

examination.title: Examination & Assessment Division
examination.description: Managing assessments, certifications, and quality assurance for all training and educational programs.

specialProjects.title: Special Projects Division
specialProjects.description: Leading innovative initiatives and special programs that address emerging youth needs and opportunities.
